meanings.definition: A book containing the texts used in the Catholic Mass.
meanings.sent1: During the service, the priest read from the missal.
meanings.sent2: The missal helped the congregation follow along with the prayers.
meanings.sent3: The missal seemed to have a mind of its own, flipping pages at unexpected moments.
meanings.sent4: Her worn missal was a treasure trove of memories from years of attending Mass.
meanings.sent5: The golden lettering on the missal shimmered in the candlelight, adding to the sacred atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A book of prayers and devotions for use during Mass.
meanings.sent1: She clutched her missal tightly as she knelt in prayer.
meanings.sent2: The missal contained beautiful hymns that uplifted the worshippers.
meanings.sent3: The missal was so well-loved that it practically had its own fan club.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed through the church as he recited from the missal with passion.
meanings.sent5: The intricate illustrations in the missal brought the prayers to life for the readers.
